TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to Texas Gazette, 04-03-1830

barker_notes.barker_summary: Editorial by Austin in Texas Gazette, April 3, 1830. Friendly disposition of local and State officials toward Texas. (Omitted.)
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 356

*p*[Texas Gazette, April 8, 1830. Preparing public mind for the establishment of garrisons in Texas. Omitted.]*/p*
